trans-unit.source: Allows text engine clients to map a text source character index to the corresponding <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gir tekst motoren klienter ikke tilordne en tekst kilde tegn indeks til tilsvarende <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The IndexedGlyphRun object allows a text engine client to obtain glyph information for a text source character such as the glyph's cluster map, glyph indices, and glyph typeface.
trans-unit.target: Objektet IndexedGlyphRun lar en tekst motoren klient ikke hente informasjon om symbol for kildetegn en tekst som den symbol klyngen kartet, symbol indekser og symbol skrift.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"></xref> that corresponds to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"> </xref> som tilsvarer det <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text source character index that corresponds to the beginning of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter tekst kilde tegnindeksen som svarer til starten av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the text source character index.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>verdi som representerer teksten kilde tegnindeksen.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the text source character length that corresponds to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter kilden tegn tekstelengden som tilsvarer det <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The value of the TextSourceLength property is not necessarily equal to the character count of the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen TextSourceLength stemmer ikke nødvendigvis tegnantall for tilsvarende <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the length of the text source character.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>verdi som representerer lengden på teksten kildetegn.</xref:System.Int32>
